entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
